column1: 63804806$Supersonic Skull Flame$$WIND$[Zombie/effect]$$$$$10$2600$2000$$$$This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 "Skull Flame" from your Graveyard. Once per turn
column2: you can inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each "Burning Skull Head" in your Graveyard. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard
column3: you can Special Summon 1 "Skull Flame" from your Graveyard.$$$$$

column2: you can Special Summon 1 "Burning Skull Head" from your hand. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. You can add 1 "Burning Skull Head" from your Graveyard to your hand instead of conducting a normal draw in your Draw Phase.$$$$$

column1: 26293219$Burning Skull Head$$FIRE$[Zombie/effect]$$$$$3$1000$800$$$$When this card is Special Summoned from your hand
